TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Omar_al-Bashir, title = Omar_al-Bashir, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Omar_al-Bashir} }

S.FORM: I 1944 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 1 a romi'ad masofoc ci Omar al-Bashir , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Sudan anini i ci Omar al-Bashir, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 16 a romi'ad.

I 1944 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 1 a romi'ad masofoc ci Omar al-Bashir , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Sodan anini i ci Omar al-Bashir, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 16 a romi'ad.
